sections.text:
23-248.Poor relief; duty of county board.

In all counties the care of the poor shall be under the charge of the county board as provided by law.

SourceLaws 1895, c. 28, § 46, p. 144;R.S.1913, § 1032;Laws 1915, c. 20, § 1, p. 80;C.S.1922, § 934;C.S.1929, § 26-248;R.S.1943, § 23-248.

Annotations

In counties under township organization, support of poor devolves upon townships. Custer Township v. Board of Supervisors of Antelope County, 103 Neb. 128, 170 N.W. 600 (1919).
